author: robert
msg: fixed a problem with read buffer resizing in TNonblockingServer
test: send a large message to a nonblocking server

author: robert
msg: fixed a bug in TFramedTransport where it was checking a size for nonzero after byte swapping it.
test: run a C++ client and server with framed transport

author: mcslee
msg: message_ in TException can't be const or subclasses break

author: mcslee
msg: Fix exceptions throw() and virtual destructor

author: mcslee
msg: All user-defined thrift exceptions inherit from TException
Summary: So you can catch more effectively
